Title: Pixie Hollow Games
Writer: Jeffrey M. Howard, David H. Steinberg (additional story material)
Actors: Megan Hilty, Brenda Song, Jason Dolley, Tiffany Thornton
Plot: The garden fairies have a legendary losing streak in the Pixie Hollow Games. Can Rosetta and the new arrival, Chloe join together to break the fairies run of bad luck?
